p: Although viremia was not detected in any of the control animals in group B inoculated with swine HEV genotype 4, the peak ALT values of each animal were greater than twice the pre-challenge values and all the control animals in this group excreted virus in the stool. Compared with that of rabbits in group A, fecal virus shedding was much delayed and viral RNA was first detected at 2 weeks post challenge and remained positive thereafter, up to the end of monitoring ( Table 1).
